attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app is terrible! It doesnâ€™t give me any reason to put this big orange man in office again. attributes.title: yikes...
attributes.review: this app is just a five nights at freddys knock off!!! instead of animatronics thereâ€™s donald trump in different outfits and you hide in the white house. now this would be good and fine if the quality wasnâ€™t so terrible and there werenâ€™t so many ads!! the jump scares are sub par and thereâ€™s not even a noise. donâ€™t get me wrong, donald has a very scary and orange face but the jump scares really donâ€™t do it for me. :( itâ€™s hard to play this game when 30 second ads pop up every few seconds and youâ€™re taking credit for scottâ€™s amazing concept of five nights at freddys! at least itâ€™s free i guess but i definitely donâ€™t recommend downloading.

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
attributes.review: This app honestly should be deleted in my opinion. The fact that it is so slow, and and has a bad, cluttered graphic designing is the reason why. I donâ€™t really see the purpose of this app when the information on here is just anything I could see on the news. I donâ€™t think that a President should have his own app in the first place.

attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review:
When I downloaded this app it wouldn't load at first,,but then it caused my whole phone to crash! I couldn't do anything on my phone. I couldn't even make phone calls. it took a week after the app was deleted to finally get my phone back to normal but it still has some bugs.  I might just have to get a new phone...
download at your own risk!

attributes.title: This App is For Idiots
attributes.review: This app is the worst thing that has ever happened and Iâ€™m surprised that people would even think to download this app. The creator of this app is Racist, Rapist, Homophobic idiot who had big dreams to run a country that he has completely ruined and at the same time unified most people against him. Trump thinks that he can win again I would like to see him try, Gen Z is coming for you.

attributes.title: traumatizing!!!!
attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE. I opened it think I would be learning good things about our country and president but instead was met with constant reminders of how awful our government is. I have never been more traumatized and hopeless as Iâ€™ve been opening this app. I even showed the app to my grandmother, and she was so traumatized she had a heart attack and almost died!! Worst experience of my life.
